title: The Magic Bowl featuring Boston Symphony Orchestra
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Part three of our special summer pop-up series -- recorded live with musicians from the Boston Symphony Orchestra -- comes from Ghana and the West Indies, and explores the dangers of greed.
